cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 1] Hi Alex, 
a. Secondly, animals rely on plants either directly or indirectly for energy within ecosystems. 
b. In conclusion, these interactions ensure ecological systems remain balanced and sustainable. 
c. Ecological systems explain how living organisms interact with their surrounding physical environment. 
d. Firstly, plants produce energy through photosynthesis and form the base of most ecosystems. 
e. Moreover, decomposers recycle nutrients back into the soil and water.
cac_dap_an: A. c - d - a - e - b|B. d - c - a - e - b|C. c - a - d - e - b|D. c - d - e - a - b
giaithich: Thứ tự: (c) Câu chủ đề giới thiệu hệ sinh thái -> (d) Firstly (Thực vật) -> (a) Secondly (Động vật) -> (e) Moreover (Phân hủy) -> (b) In conclusion.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 2] Hi Emma, 
a. In addition, forests help regulate climate by absorbing large amounts of carbon dioxide. 
b. Forest ecosystems play a vital role in maintaining environmental balance worldwide. 
c. Finally, protecting forests is essential for long-term ecological sustainability. 
d. Firstly, forests provide habitats for numerous plant and animal species. 
e. Secondly, they prevent soil erosion and protect important water resources.
cac_dap_an: A. b - d - a - e - c|B. b - d - e - a - c|C. d - b - a - e - c|D. b - a - d - e - c
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề Rừng -> (d) Firstly (Môi trường sống) -> (e) Secondly (Chống xói mòn) -> (a) In addition (Khí hậu) -> (c) Finally.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 3] Hello Tom, 
a. Secondly, wetlands naturally filter pollutants and improve water quality. 
b. Furthermore, they reduce flooding by absorbing excess rainwater during heavy storms. 
c. Wetlands are highly productive ecological systems supporting diverse forms of life. 
d. Firstly, wetlands provide habitats for many species of birds, fish, and plants. 
e. To sum up, wetlands should be protected from human destruction.
cac_dap_an: A. c - d - a - b - e|B. c - a - d - b - e|C. d - c - a - b - e|D. c - d - b - a - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (c) Chủ đề Đất ngập nước -> (d) Firstly -> (a) Secondly -> (b) Furthermore -> (e) To sum up.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 4] Hi Lucy, 
a. Moreover, these ecosystems support fishing industries and coastal communities worldwide. 
b. Marine ecosystems cover most of the Earth’s surface and support ocean biodiversity. 
c. Secondly, coral reefs provide shelter and food for numerous marine species. 
d. In conclusion, marine ecosystems require urgent protection from human activities. 
e. Firstly, marine ecosystems help regulate the global climate system.
cac_dap_an: A. b - e - c - a - d|B. e - b - c - a - d|C. b - c - e - a - d|D. b - e - a - c - d
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề Biển -> (e) Firstly (Khí hậu) -> (c) Secondly (San hô) -> (a) Moreover (Kinh tế) -> (d) In conclusion.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 5] Dear Jack, 
a. Secondly, consumers obtain energy by feeding on plants or other animals. 
b. In addition, decomposers break down dead organisms and recycle nutrients efficiently. 
c. Every ecosystem consists of producers, consumers, and decomposers interacting together. 
d. Finally, these processes allow ecosystems to function continuously over time. 
e. Firstly, producers such as plants create food using energy from sunlight.
cac_dap_an: A. c - e - a - b - d|B. c - a - e - b - d|C. e - c - a - b - d|D. c - e - b - a - d
giaithich: Thứ tự: (c) Giới thiệu 3 thành phần -> (e) Firstly (Producers) -> (a) Secondly (Consumers) -> (b) In addition (Decomposers) -> (d) Finally.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 6] Hi Sarah, 
a. Secondly, this pollution harms wildlife, plant growth, and human health seriously. 
b. In conclusion, reducing pollution is necessary to protect ecological systems. 
c. Human activities have significantly affected ecological systems across the planet. 
d. Firstly, industrial pollution contaminates air, water, and soil in many regions. 
e. Furthermore, damaged ecosystems become less stable and productive.
cac_dap_an: A. c - d - a - e - b|B. d - c - a - e - b|C. c - a - d - e - b|D. c - d - e - a - b
giaithich: Thứ tự: (c) Chủ đề tác động con người -> (d) Firstly (Ô nhiễm) -> (a) Secondly (Tác hại cụ thể) -> (e) Furthermore (Hệ quả) -> (b) In conclusion.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 7] Hello Ben, 
a. Secondly, animals depend on plants directly or indirectly for energy. 
b. Moreover, decomposers break down dead organisms and return nutrients to ecosystems. 
c. Food chains illustrate how energy flows through an ecological system. 
d. To sum up, food chains connect all living organisms within ecosystems. 
e. Firstly, plants form the base of food chains as primary producers.
cac_dap_an: A. c - e - a - b - d|B. e - c - a - b - d|C. c - a - e - b - d|D. c - e - b - a - d
giaithich: Thứ tự: (c) Định nghĩa chuỗi thức ăn -> (e) Firstly (Thực vật) -> (a) Secondly (Động vật) -> (b) Moreover (Phân hủy) -> (d) To sum up.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 8] Dear Lisa, 
a. Secondly, sustainable practices help reduce damage to ecological systems. 
b. Sustainable development aims to balance economic growth with environmental protection. 
c. Moreover, healthy ecosystems provide essential services for human survival. 
d. Firstly, it encourages responsible use of natural resources. 
e. To sum up, sustainability ensures long-term ecological health.
cac_dap_an: A. c - b - e - a - d|B. b - c - e - a - d|C. c - e - b - a - d|D. b - d - a - c - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề phát triển bền vững -> (d) Firstly (Tài nguyên) -> (a) Secondly (Giảm thiệt hại) -> (c) Moreover (Dịch vụ) -> (e) To sum up.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 9] Hi Daniel, 
a. Furthermore, ecosystem balance may be disrupted as species fail to survive. 
b. Firstly, rising temperatures affect species distribution and migration patterns. 
c. Climate change is causing serious changes to ecological systems worldwide. 
d. In conclusion, immediate climate action is vital for ecosystem protection. 
e. Secondly, many species struggle to adapt to rapid environmental changes.
cac_dap_an: A. c - b - e - a - d|B. c - e - a - b - d|C. c - e - b - a - d|D. c - b - a - e - d
giaithich: Thứ tự: (c) Chủ đề biến đổi khí hậu -> (b) Firstly (Nhiệt độ) -> (e) Secondly (Thích nghi) -> (a) Furthermore (Mất cân bằng) -> (d) In conclusion.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 10] Hi Peter, 
a. Furthermore, controlled human activities help reduce environmental damage significantly. 
b. Secondly, human activities are strictly controlled within these protected areas. 
c. National parks are important for conserving ecological systems and biodiversity. 
d. In conclusion, national parks play a vital role in conservation efforts. 
e. Firstly, they protect natural habitats for endangered plant and animal species.
cac_dap_an: A. c - e - b - a - d|B. c - e - b - a - d|C. c - b - e - a - d|D. c - e - a - b - d
giaithich: Thứ tự: (c) Chủ đề vườn quốc gia -> (e) Firstly (Bảo vệ nơi sống) -> (b) Secondly (Kiểm soát con người) -> (a) Furthermore (Giảm thiệt hại) -> (d) In conclusion.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 11] 
a. Moreover, local communities should be involved... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites is essential... 
c. In addition, governments need to invest... 
d. Finally, international cooperation... 
e. To sum up, combined efforts...
cac_dap_an: A. b - c - a - d - e|B. b - c - d - a - e|C. b - a - d - c - e|D. b - d - c - a - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề -> (c) Chính phủ -> (a) Cộng đồng -> (d) Finally (Quốc tế) -> (e) To sum up.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 12] 
a. In addition, educating young people... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites plays a vital role... 
c. Finally, strict laws and regulations... 
d. Moreover, sustainable tourism helps... 
e. In conclusion, education, legal protection, and sustainable tourism...
cac_dap_an: A. b - a - d - c - e|B. b - d - a - c - e|C. b - a - c - d - e|D. b - d - c - a - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề -> (a) Giáo dục -> (d) Du lịch -> (c) Finally (Luật pháp) -> (e) In conclusion.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 13] 
a. Finally, raising international funds... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites is important... 
c. Moreover, modern technology allows... 
d. In addition, community participation... 
e. To sum up, financial support, technology, and community involvement...
cac_dap_an: A. b - c - d - a - e|B. b - d - c - a - e|C. b - c - a - d - e|D. b - d - a - c - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề -> (c) Công nghệ -> (d) Cộng đồng -> (a) Finally (Quỹ) -> (e) To sum up.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 14] 
a. Moreover, climate change has increased risks... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites helps... 
c. In addition, careful planning can reduce... 
d. Finally, cooperation between scientists... 
e. In conclusion, awareness, planning, and cooperation...
cac_dap_an: A. b - c - d - a - e|B. b - d - c - a - e|C. b - c - a - d - e|D. b - d - a - c - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề -> (c) Quy hoạch -> (a) Biến đổi khí hậu -> (d) Finally (Hợp tác) -> (e) In conclusion. Câu (d) phải đứng cuối thân bài.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 15] 
a. In addition, digital preservation... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites is necessary... 
c. Moreover, trained professionals... 
d. Finally, public awareness campaigns... 
e. To sum up, technology, expertise, and public responsibility...
cac_dap_an: A. b - a - c - d - e|B. b - c - a - d - e|C. b - a - d - c - e|D. b - c - d - a - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề -> (a) Kỹ thuật số -> (c) Chuyên gia -> (d) Finally (Nhận thức) -> (e) To sum up.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 16] 
a. Moreover, preserving heritage sites can support local economies... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites allows societies to learn... 
c. In addition, clear guidelines help visitors... 
d. Finally, long-term conservation plans... 
e. In conclusion, education, tourism management, and planning...
cac_dap_an: A. b - a - c - d - e|B. b - c - a - d - e|C. b - a - d - c - e|D. b - c - d - a - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề -> (a) Kinh tế -> (c) Quy định du lịch -> (d) Finally (Kế hoạch dài hạn) -> (e) In conclusion.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 17] 
a. In addition, cooperation with international organizations... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites is crucial... 
c. Moreover, local authorities must enforce protection laws... 
d. Finally, community education helps... 
e. To sum up, legal enforcement, cooperation, and education...
cac_dap_an: A. b - a - c - d - e|B. b - c - a - d - e|C. b - a - d - c - e|D. b - c - d - a - e
giaithich: Thứ tự: (b) Chủ đề -> (c) Luật pháp -> (a) Hợp tác -> (d) Finally (Giáo dục) -> (e) Kết bài tóm tắt đúng thứ tự Legal -> Cooperation -> Education.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 18] 
a. Moreover, preserving heritage sites strengthens national pride... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites helps maintain a strong connection... 
c. In addition, scientific research contributes... 
d. Finally, responsible tourism policies... 
e. In conclusion, cultural pride, research, and tourism management...
cac_dap_an: A. b - c - a - d - e|B. b - a - d - c - e|C. b - c - d - a - e|D. b - a - c - d - e
giaithich: Thứ tự kết bài là Pride -> Research -> Tourism, nên thân bài phải là (a) Pride -> (c) Research -> (d) Tourism. Đáp án D đúng.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 19] 
a. In addition, international campaigns... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites is a shared responsibility... 
c. Moreover, financial investment is necessary... 
d. Finally, education programs help... 
e. To sum up, awareness, funding, and education...
cac_dap_an: A. b - a - c - d - e|B. b - c - a - d - e|C. b - a - d - c - e|D. b - c - d - a - e
giaithich: Thứ tự kết bài: Awareness -> Funding -> Education. Thân bài tương ứng: (a) Campaigns -> (c) Investment -> (d) Education. Đáp án A đúng.

cauhoi:
[I. WRITING][Question 20] 
a. Moreover, preserving heritage sites promotes intercultural dialogue... 
b. Preserving world heritage sites ensures that... 
c. In addition, modern conservation methods... 
d. Finally, strong policies encourage... 
e. In conclusion, cultural respect, technology, and policy...
cac_dap_an: A. b - a - c - d - e|B. b - c - a - d - e|C. b - a - d - c - e|D. b - c - d - a - e
giaithich: Thứ tự kết bài: Cultural respect -> Technology -> Policy. Thân bài tương ứng: (a) Dialogue -> (c) Methods -> (d) Policies. Đáp án A đúng.
